Author: LocoMB#8593
Content:
oki - just to be sure for those that have a knack for doing things the wrong way: 🐫 
Agama0.3.1d is for all Komodo, including ARRR, correct?
since ARRR is by default z-address, my ARRR need to go to a new address, correct?
now the big question:
Do I need to move my KMD, BET, SUPERNET, DEX, and all the other assets to new addresses too?
this is an important Q that makes me a bit insecure

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: only sprout addresses (starting with zc) need to be zmigrated to sapling addresses (starting with zs)

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: unless you manually did zaddr with the non-PIRATE chains, there is nothing that needs to be moved
